relation.text: now , but tho this is a very Charming Place , and Lady Elizabeth Archer and I amuses
winter in the South of france , Mrs Fielding was gone
now my Dear Miſs Hamilton I hope
beleive me with very sincere regard and esteem , My Dear Madam your most affectionat and much obliged Cath : Walkinshaw Hale by Downton Wilts Octr 1 st 1781
